pages.text: If one is lucky enough to encounter a mythical creature in the wild, it is oftentimes possible to befriend the beast if one knows the correct means.$(br2)Offerings of certain foods or items liked by the creature are a surefire way of befriending many kinds of legendary mount given enough time and persistence.

$(br)Wild mounts can also be trained to carry a rider using traditional horsemanship techniques.$(br2)By repeatedly riding a wild mount, it will eventually become accustomed to the rider. As trust is developed over time, the mount will bond with the the tamer and eventually accept a saddle, allowing them to be ridden freely.

$(br)Some amount of patience is required regardless of the taming method. Consequently, the time it takes to tame a given mount will depend greatly on the individual temperament of the creature. Some will take more time to become accustomed to a rider than others.$(br2)Remember to reward cooperation with positive reinforcement, treats, and pats!$(br)$(o)(crouch + right click).
